column4: okay so it turns out I have a laptop with UEFI, which is preventing me from installing grub.... well I can install it without any errors, but grub does not boot. The laptop model is Fujitsu Lifebook AH532.....anybody have any experience on howto install ubuntu on such a system
- i've installed ubuntu/mint/debian on three separate lifebooks in the last 3 years, i had no problems... maybe thats reassuring to know?
uefi is relatively new so it's a slightly different problem... does wireless etc work well on the lifebooks you have though?
